scenario: Respondent submits questionnaire with name and all required answers
expected_output: System confirms submission and displays success notification
actual_output: System confirms submission and displays success notification

scenario: Respondent submits questionnaire without name but completes all required answers
expected_output: System confirms submission and displays success notification
actual_output: System confirms submission and displays success notification

scenario: Respondent submits questionnaire with missing required answer
expected_output: System displays validation message indicating required field
actual_output: System displays validation message indicating required field

scenario: Business owner completes all required business registration fields
expected_output: System confirms action and displays success notification
actual_output: System confirms action and displays success notification

scenario: Business owner submits registration with missing mandatory fields
expected_output: System displays validation message indicating required field
actual_output: System displays validation message indicating required field

scenario: Business owner searches using a valid business code

actual_output: System displays buyer persona dashboard including respondent data, segmentation charts, and business identity

scenario: Business owner searches without providing business code
expected_output: System displays validation message indicating required field
actual_output: System displays validation message indicating required field

scenario: System generates buyer persona based on business category and aggregated respondent inputs
expected_output: Buyer persona is generated and visualized on the dashboard
actual_output: Buyer persona is generated and visualized on the dashboard
